## XPaths Modified

- st-mesh-psk(grouping)/description
- st-mesh-psk(grouping)/psk-key

### Description

- A new length expression '0..64' added
- A new length expression '0 | 3..32' added

### Reason

CLI is accepting mesh provision key more than 32 in first time
